resources.string: Let\'s start off, giving you some information to guarantee a successful learning experience.

Our app is fully open-source, freely available for possible modification. We respect your privacy. For that reason, we don\'t collect personal data. Your data will be treated confidentially and only stored locally on your phone.
Keep track of your progress with automatic diagrams. Explore even more features in the settings or disable them to customize the app according to your needs.
All set. We wish you a pleasant start! We are open to any suggestions and look forward to your feedback.
